chunk: Ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture, Hydrolyzed collagen, Milk Protein, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 (Argireline), Palmitoyl Dipeptide-10, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) LEAF EXTRACT, Tropaeolum majus flower/lead/stem Extract, Porphyridium cruentum extract, Camellia Sinensis leaf Extract, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary)

book: 2714-Lacfin Facial Sheet Mask For Brides To Be

chunk: Directions: 1. Cleanse and dry your face thoroughly and unfold the sheet mask. 2. Remove the white protective layer gently. Place the mask with blue protective side facing outward. Apply from forehead down to your chin, align the openings provided in the mask with your eyes, nostrils, and mouth alike. 3. Peel off the blue protective layer. Smooth

chunk: 3. Peel off the blue protective layer. Smooth air bubbles toward edges, until it firmly adheres to the face. 4. Allow ingredients to absorb for 15 to 20 minutes before removing. Avoid cleansing or rinsing the face after removing mask. Suggest Use: One facial sheet mask every other day.
